com.fluidops.fedx.algebra

Class FedXStatementPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelNodeBase
      • org.openrdf.query.algebra.StatementPattern
        • com.fluidops.fedx.algebra.FedXStatementPattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundJoinTupleExpr, FilterTuple, QueryRef, StatementTupleExpr, java.lang.Cloneable, org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelNode, org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExclusiveStatement, StatementSourcePattern

    public abstract class FedXStatementPattern
extends org.openrdf.query.algebra.StatementPattern
implements StatementTupleExpr, FilterTuple, BoundJoinTupleExpr
    Base class providing all common functionality for FedX StatementPatterns
    Author:
    Andreas Schwarte
    See Also:
    StatementSourcePattern, ExclusiveStatement

        register a filter that can be directly expressed as a binding, e.g. SELECT * WHERE { ?s p o . FILTER (?s = X) } is equivalent to SELECT * WHERE { X p o . }
